data.title: Partners - About us - Enterprise Knowledge Graph Solutions
data.meta_description: Manage the growing complexity & dynamics of your markets, networks and products with the eccenca enterprise knowledge graph software.
data.text:
Aarth Private Ltd. is an Indian company committed to mature an organization's understanding of data and transform decision making with meaningful insights.

brox IT design, consult and develop digital processes with which companies increase their success. They combine agile project management, methodical competence, specialist IT expertise and absolute reliability.

The management and IT consulting MHP combines technology expertise with mobility and manufacturing know-how. This makes MHP an internationally renowned premium business partner for the digitization of the entire value chain - with locations in Germany, the USA, the UK, Romania and China.

With more than 469,000 employees and deep-set commitment to their clients, TATA TCS has been providing innovative, best-in-class consulting, IT solutions and services since 1968.

Digital Mission Pioneers (dmp!) is a thought leader in helping organizations grasp this potential and turn it into new and sustainable digital business models

MVI Group has been driving the mobility of the future forward for over 50 years. With our passion for mobility, we combine decades of automotive expertise with the digital world, enabling us to always offer our customers the right solution in the overall product development process.

Mendix is the low-code platform for everyone to make business better. The enable you to make anything you can imagine, from enterprise-grade apps that help factories run smoothly to simple tools to save you time.

ARTEMIS Industry Association is a membership organization with about 200 members and associates from all over Europe. The association continuously promotes its members R&I interestes in Embedded Intelligent Systems to the European Commission and the Public Authorities of the participating states.

DBpedia is a crowd-sourced community effort to extract structured content from the information created in various Wikimedia projects and make it available in an open knowledge graph. Currently it describes more than 38m things (Feb 2021) in 125 languages.

The Eclipse Foundation provides our global community of individuals and organizations with a mature, scalable, and business-friendly environment for open source software collaboration and innovation. Businesses of all sizes in various industries are benefiting from open source projects hosted at the Eclipse Foundation.

The Enterprise Knowledge Graph Foundation is a non-profit trade association established as a coordination body for the knowledge graph community. Its objective is to define best practices and mature the marketplace for Enterprise Knowledge Graph (EKG) adoption.

The Institute for Applied Informatics association was founded in 2006 to promote science and research in the areas of Computer Science and Information Systems. Its one of the most important institutes to research big data/smart data, logistics, analytics and service in Europe.

The International Data Spaces Association (IDSA) is a coalition of more than 120 member companies that share a vision of a world where all companies self-determine usage rules and realize the full value of their data in secure, trusted, equal partnerships; and we are making that vision a reality.

As the national public procurement agency in France, the Union des Groupements dâ€™Achats Publics (UGAP) assesses and approves technology and service providers and provides the French public sector purchasers with a wide catalog of software that meets all their needs, whether they are one-off or associated with complex projects.
